class.rdfs:comment: A trip on a commercial bus line.
class.rdfs:label: BusTrip

schema:arrivalBusStop.rdfs:comment: The stop or station from which the bus arrives.
schema:arrivalBusStop.rdfs:label: arrivalBusStop

schema:busName.rdfs:comment: The name of the bus (e.g. Bolt Express).
schema:busName.rdfs:label: busName

schema:busNumber.rdfs:comment: The unique identifier for the bus.
schema:busNumber.rdfs:label: busNumber

schema:departureBusStop.rdfs:comment: The stop or station from which the bus departs.
schema:departureBusStop.rdfs:label: departureBusStop
